version_description:
- Correzioni di bug e altre modifiche minori.

Se vuoi essere il primo a ricevere gli aggiornamenti dell'app, scrivici a ios@mega.nz indicando il tuo indirizzo email e ti aggiungeremo al TestFlight di MEGA.

Vogliamo risolvere i tuoi problemi!

- Fixed issues with new Apple filesystem (APFS)

If you want to be the first one to receive the updates of the app write to ios@mega.nz giving us your email and we will add you to MEGA's TestFlight.

We want to solve your problems! If you repo

- Chat: MEGA protects your chat with end-to-end (user controlled) encryption providing essential safety assurances.
- Include files from your Cloud Drive directly in a chat. You can import chat files to your Cloud Drive or Save for Offline (Long pres

- Miscellaneous bug fixes and performance improvements

If you want to be one of the first to receive updates of the app write to ios@mega.nz giving us your email and we will add you to MEGA’s TestFlight.

We want to solve your problems! If yo

- Document and file providers. You can see and edit in others apps files from MEGA. Also, export files to other apps from MEGA.
"See and edit mode" example. Steps to edit a file using Pages: open Pages, select Locations, choose MEGA, select a file, ed

- Share extension. You can upload files from other apps. Example from Photos: Go to Photos, select photos/videos, tap share button, select MEGA, choose destination folder and tap on Upload.

- Chat:
- Show images.
- Stream audio and vi

- Use Spotlight to search your files in MEGA.
- Change avatar (My Account -> Edit -> Change avatar).
- Support for HEIF images (iOS 11).
- Backup a contact in MEGA (from Contacts).

- Chat:
- Upload photos or videos directly to

- Now the app only have five tabs: Cloud Drive, Camera Uploads, Chat, Shared and My Account. So, Offline, Contacts, Transfers, Settings and My Account itself are grouped on the new My Account view.
- Improved language change in-app. Now we force you to

- New way to create and manage links. Share a link with or without key. For pro users: set expiry date and password.
- Open links with password.
- When open a folder/file inside a folder link the app opens directly the folder/file instead the root f

- URL clickable in chats.
- Storage quota in My Account tab.
- Upload PDF from Safari in iOS 11.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes and performance improvements.

If you want to be the first one to receive the updates of the app write to ios@mega.nz

- New mobile help centre: browse the new help centre directly from MEGA, under My account -> Settings -> Help. Get to know the basics and a few helpful tips for our MEGA app on iOS devices.
- UI fixes for iPad: misplaced popovers under Contacts,

- Streaming improvements. Also, you can stream multimedia files from a link.
- Open the app from a notification redirects you to the proper tab.
- Fixed bug that made the keyboard invisible in the passcode view for some users.
- The Share extensi

- Fixed bug: heic and png are uploaded as jpg.
- Fixed bug: you can't remove a contact when the user is not your contact anymore (happened on chat details)
- Fixed crash for messages without content.
- Send the same photo to different chats when

- 3D Touch. Added compatibility with peek and pop gestures. Home Screen Quick Actions: Search, Upload and Offline. Also, in the Cloud Drive, Shared, Chat, Contacts and Offline sections, you will be able to peek and pop and do some actions related to the s

- New design for upgrade account.
- Allow to buy a higher plan. In previous versions you can't upgrade your account if you had a pro plan.
- Other miscellaneous bug fixes and performance improvements.

If you want to be the first one to receiv

- Chat new design.
- Other miscellaneous bug fixes and performance improvements.

If you want to be the first one to receive updates of the app write to iosfeedback@mega.nz giving us your email and we will add you to MEGA's TestFlight.

We

- Audio and video calls. Allow send and receive audio and video calls to / from your MEGA contacts.
- A new fresh design to ease chat with your MEGA contacts.
- Video player improvements, adopting Picture in Picture lets a user play video in a movea

- New design for Camera Uploads view and warning modals.
- Share photos faster in chat.
- Fixed: don't dim the screen while you are in a call.
- Fixed: loop with face ID authentication in Files.app and Share extension.
- Fixed: crash when edit

- Sort chats correctly after enabling the chat.
- Added a password strength indicator (when changing password or create account).
- Save the text introduced in a chat room as drafts.
- Show retry icon in contact and attachment messages.
- Fixe

- Allow switching to landscape during a call.
- Show local video in fullscreen when there isn't a remote video.
- Added a button to enable/disable the speaker. By default, audio calls have disabled the speaker and video calls have enabled the speake

- Fixed bug: heic and png are uploaded as jpg.
- Fixed bug: you can't remove a contact when the user is not your contact anymore (happened on chat details)
- Fixed crash for messages without content.
- Send the same photo to different chats when

- Miscellaneous bugs fixes.

If you want to be the first one to receive the updates of the app write to iosfeedback@mega.nz giving us your email and we will add you to MEGA's TestFlight.

If you want to be the first one to receive the updates of the app write to iosfeedback@mega.nz giving us your email and we will add you to MEGA's TestFlight.

We want to solve your problems! If you reported an issu

- Local pricing for subscriptions.
- Fixed UI bug in the photo/video picker.
- Fixed crash when editing messages that aren't received by the server.
- Fixed crash when streaming from links.
- Allow password change without the old password (onl

- New design. We have improved the app with some new views to enhance your interaction, also we have redesigned some others. We added some gestures: Swipe to left to share and swipe to right to download.
- Show versions of files. Allow to download, rev

- Enhance the chat experience with Rich links previews. When you write a URL in a message we will ask you if you want to enable this option so that you and your contacts can see Rich links previews. You can enable or disable it in Settings -> Chat -&gt

- New ways to share files with your contacts. Now, you can share files and text snippets from other apps directly to a contact or group. Optionally, you can rename files before being shared. Also, you can forward chat messages and share their contents to

- Support for multi-factor authentication.
- Gif support.
- Manual uploads are not lost when you restart the app.
- Fixed issue where some multimedia files were treated as unsupported. Now we manage all our compatible formats properly and in case

- Support new image formats: cr2, crw, cur, dng, ico, j2c, jp2, jpf, nef, orf, pbm, pgm, pnm, ppm, psd, raf, rw2, rwl and tga
- Fixed issues for right to left languages.
- Allow preview documents (that are in MEGA, not in the device) although there

- Save photos and videos in the camera roll is easier, if the file in MEGA is an image or a video compatible with the Camera Roll a new option will appear "Save to Photos" in the file actions.
- New row in Settings, "File Management". There you can fin

- Miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements.

- Camera Upload Version 2. We are thrilled to let you know that now you can choose to convert the HEIC/HEVC photos and videos to the most compatible JPEG/H.264 formats. We also added supports to live photos, burst photos, hidden album, video upload on mob

- Recent contacts: share files and forward messages faster with the contacts you usually talk to.
- Allow to share files from incoming shared folders in a chat.
- Fix problem with streaming in Apple TV.
- Other miscellaneous bug fixes and improve

Public group chats. When you create a group chat, in case that you want it public and with a chat link, just let the default configuration. Share the chat link, this way people can preview the chat and join it. Moderators can

version_description:
- Recent Files. It is a new section of the Cloud Drive which lists recently added or modified files within your MEGA account.
- Send voice clips. Record and send voice messages to your contacts.
- Send location. Share a location with your contacts.

- Camera Upload Version 2. We are thrilled to let you know that now you can choose to convert the HEIC/HEVC photos and videos to the most compatible JPEG/H.264 formats. We also added supports to live photos, burst photos, hidden album, video upload on mob

- New option for passcode: My Account -> Settings -> Passcode -> Require passcode. You can choose between different durations that needs to pass while application is in background for the lock to be displayed.
- Several bug fixes and improve

- See all your links together in Shared Items section.
- Get/manage/remove link and share/manage/remove shared folder can be accessed faster, just tap on the dots of a node ... .
- New options available for Camera Uploads, because maybe you want to

- Miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements.

- Verify and reset credentials (My account -> Contacts -> Select a Contact -> Verify Credentials).
- New setting for Camera Upload: Include location tags (My Account -> Settings -> Came

- 全新设计的深色模式。

- 重新设计的 「联系人」：如果你点击一个联系人，对应的聊天将会被打开。如果你点击信息按钮，联系信息将被显示。新联系人将出现在最近添加的新部分。我们还新增了一个群组分类，你可以在里面看到所有的群组聊天。

- 重新设计的 「我的账号」：现在能够快速访问和扫描你的MEGA二维码。

-设定--外观：现在你可以更改排序和视图模式应用偏好。每个文件夹排序偏好可以(它是默认的),或者你可以选择相同的排序对整个应用程序的偏好。相同的视图模式的偏好: 您

- 全新设计的深色模式。

- 重新设计的 「联系人」：如果你点击一个联系人，对应的聊天将会被打开。如果你点击信息按钮，联系信息将被显示。新联系人将出现在最近添加的新部分。我们还新增了一个群组分类，你可以在里面看到所有的群组聊天。

- 重新设计的 「我的账号」：现在能够快速访问和扫描你的MEGA二维码。

我们想解决您的问题！ 如果您在App Store评论中报告了问题，请发送详细电子邮件至support@mega.nz，以便我们在下一版本中进行修复。 感谢您使用MEGA！

- 全新设计聊天室视图。
- 全新聊天输入工具栏。发现更多内容，打开聊天室并点击加号‘+’按钮。
- 发表聊天态度。在聊天消息中可以发表态度并查看谁对消息发表了态度（对消息或态度使用长按手势）。
- 全新设计文件/文件夹信息视图。
- 在不打开聊天室的情况下将消息标记为已读，长按聊天以查看更多选项。
- 其他一些错误修复和改进。

如果您想在第一时间获取更新内容，请访问以下链接：https://testflight.apple.com/join/4x1P5Tnx<

- New design for chat rooms view.
- New input toolbar for chats. Discover more opening a chat room and tapping on + button.
- Chat message reactions. Add reactions to messages in a chat and see who reacts a message (using long press gesture over mes

- Favourites and labels. Mark files and folders as favourites and add labels to them (… —> favourite/label). Sort by favourites or labels (… —> Sort by). Favourites and label icons only appear on files and folders in list view.
- Get link redesig

- Favourites and labels. Mark files and folders as favourites and add labels to them (… —> favourite/label). Sort by favourites or labels (… —> Sort by). Favourites and label icons only appear on files and folders in list view.
- Get link redesig

- Send GIFs in your chats. Open a chat, tap on + and choose a GIF.
- Transfer widget. During transfers, a widget will appear at the bottom right corner indicating their progress. You can tap on it to see the transfers in progress and the completed ones

- Transfer widget. During transfers, a widget will appear at the bottom right corner indicating their progress. You can tap on it to see the transfers in progress and the completed ones
